properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
M/V GULF PETROLEUM 4, INJURED PERSONS ON BOARD,
SUFFERED AN ENGINE ROOM EXPLOSION IN
31-59.32N 015-53.01E AT 221638Z MAR. VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC MONROVIA,
PHONE: 2317 7709 2229, 2317 7729 0158,
E-MAIL: MRCC.MONROVIA@YAHOO.COM.
